# **Tender Announcement**
**Human Centred Design Services**
================================

### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Number: PS24-AG-001

The Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is inviting proposals for the supply of Human Centred Design (HCD) services to support its organizational transformation.

**Key Information:**
----------------

* **Reference Number:** MX-43031815163
* **Publication Date:** 12 February 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** 7 March 2024, 2:00 PM CST (Saskatchewan time)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Background:**
------------

The FCC has an in-house design thinking/HCD function split into two teams that work closely together. The teams are seeking a Proponent to provide thought partnership, employee development through training, and surge capacity.

**Scope of Services:**
-------------------

The Proponent shall provide HCD services to support the following activities:

* Thought partnership in the development of the organization's HCD strategy
* Employee development through training and support
* Surge capacity for project-based work

**Pricing and Terms:**
------------------

All conditions for Proponent participation are included in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents.

**Contract Duration:**
------------------

The maximum term length of the contract is five (5) years.

**Requirements and Evaluation Criteria:**
-----------------------------------------

The evaluation will be based on the Proponent's qualifications, expertise, and proposed approach to delivering the required services.

**Procurement Process:**
----------------------

This opportunity is covered under the provisions of Chapter 5 (Government Procurement) of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Chapter 19 (Government Procurement) of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

** Electronic Tendering:**
-------------------------

The RFP, including any attachments and amendments, is available on MERX, a Canadian Public Tenders electronic bidding system accessible at https://www.merx.com. Proponents must submit their proposals electronically through MERX prior to the tender closing date.

Contact Information:
-------------------
